items.title: Attachment
items.description: Attachment fields allow you to upload files to your records. You can upload any file type, and the file will be linked to the record. You can also upload multiple files to a single Attachment field record.

items.title: Barcode
items.description: Barcode is a custom field type that allows you to generate a barcode from a string value. This is useful for generating barcodes for things like URLs, phone numbers, or other data that can be represented as a string.

items.title: Checkbox
items.description: The checkbox field type is used to store boolean values. It can be used to store a simple yes/no value, or true/false, or any other boolean value.

items.title: Conditional expressions
items.description: Conditional expressions

items.title: Currency
items.description: Currency field type is used to store currency values. It is a numerical field with additional provision to set the currency symbol in display.

items.title: Date
items.description: Date field type is used to store date values. NocoDB supports a wide range of date formats, as detailed in the table below.

items.title: Date functions
items.description: | Name              | Syntax                                                                                                                                                                                                       | Sample                                                | Output                                                                                                  | Remark                                                                                                                                                                                        |

items.title: Date Time
items.description: Date Time field type is used to store both date and time values in a single field.

items.title: Decimal
items.description: Decimal field type is used to store decimal values. Use cases include storing salary, price, etc. NocoDB supports precision of upto 8 digits.

items.title: Duration
items.description: Duration field type is used to store duration of time in seconds or minutes. Different formats are supported by NocoDB, as detailed in the table below.

items.title: Email
items.description: Email field is text based field custom-built for storing E-mail IDs. It is a special type of Single line text field with

items.title: Formula
items.description: Create a formula field

items.title: Geometry
items.description: Create a geometry field

items.title: JSON
items.description: JSON is a custom field type that allows you to store JSON data in a field. Useful for storing data that can be represented as a JSON object, like API Response, or a set of key-value pairs.

items.title: Links
items.description: Links field type is used to establish relationship between tables & create links to other records.

items.title: Long text
items.description: Long Text field is text based field that allows text in multiple lines. It is useful for storing lengthy text like description, notes, etc.

items.title: LookUp
items.description: Lookup fields help bring additional field information from related table into the current table. This is useful when you want to display additional information about a record in a table. For example, if you have a table of Orders and a table of Customers, you can use a Lookup field to display the customer's name and address in the Orders table.

items.title: Multi Select
items.description: Multi Select fields allow you to select multiple options from a list of options. The options can be defined in the field configuration.

items.title: Number
items.description: Number field type is used to store numerical values. Use cases include storing age, salary, price, quantity, etc.

items.title: Numeric and Logical Operators
items.description: Numeric operators

items.title: Numeric functions
items.description: Numeric functions

items.title: Percent
items.description: Percent field type is used to store percentage values. Use cases include storing discount, tax, etc.

items.title: Phone Number
items.description: Phone number field is text based field that allows you to store phone numbers. It also allows you to validate the phone number.

items.title: QR code
items.description: QR code is a custom field type that allows you to generate a QR code from a string value. This is useful for generating QR codes for things like URLs, phone numbers, or other data that can be represented as a string.

items.title: Rating
items.description: The

items.title: Rollup
items.description: Rollup fields are used to aggregate data from fields in the related table. Often used to calculate totals, averages, and other aggregate data.

items.title: Single line text
items.description: Single line text field is a simple text based field. It can hold any text value. It is generally used for storing short text values like name, email, phone number, etc. For storing text values with multiple lines, use Long text field.

items.title: Single Select
items.description: Single select fields allow you to select a single option from a list of options. The options can be defined in the field configuration.

items.title: Specific DB type
items.description: Create a Specific DB Type field

items.title: String functions
items.description: String functions

items.title: Time
items.description: Time field type is used to store time values in a single column. Time formats supported by NocoDB are listed in the table below.
